name: There's no time for a world-spanning adventure; you have to enter the Galaxy of Grind!
name_original: There's no time for a world-spanning adventure; you have to enter the Galaxy of Grind!
description: "There's no time for a world-spanning adventure; you have to enter the Galaxy of Grind!" is a power-levelling simulator that puts you in the role of a hero who needs to be level 99 right now. Defeat monsters and upgrade your heroes in order to earn those precious, precious experience points in order to level up!
